name: TopHatRadio
0:
”Alexa, open top hat radio”
”Alexa, start top hat radio”
”Alexa, ask top hat radio what's playing”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: top hat radio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
DJ Chilly E presents a webradio station for those who love and miss the music from yesterday.
´Top Hat Radio´ brings you the hottest Old School jams, as well as smooth R&B from the 90`s-2000`s, groovy funk tunes from the 80`s, smooth soul tracks from the 70`s, as well as classic hits from the 60`s.
"The Weekend Mixtape" showcases the hottest mixes from international DJs every Saturday at 8pm (CET)
Start your Sunday mornings with the "New Urban Jazz Lounge" presented by Mr. Bob Baldwin at 10am (CET)
So tune in and enjoy the music and memories from the best time of your life!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
